Detailed Description

DBObject acts an object layer to make working with the database easer and less error prone.

void DBObject2.DBObject.Where ( string  where_clause,
params object[]  query_parameters 
)

Gets just the rows that meet the MySQL where caluse. After this method, the Rows property will only contain Rows that match the where caluse.

Parameters:
where_clauseExamle: "first_name=@0 AND last_name=@1"
query_parametersObject list to match the where clause
